rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: A modest yet welcoming entrance area with a small reception counter and coat closet. This space is aligned with Vastu principles by ensuring the main entry faces north or east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A multifunctional living area with integrated kitchenette for informal dining. Open plan design to foster family interactions, adhering to colonial aesthetics with wooden beams and minimal ornamentation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed for comfort and privacy. The placement ensures a clear view of the garden (south-facing) following Vastu.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A shared bedroom for the family or guest room. Positioned towards the west to promote balance according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living space with a small kitchenette and bathroom for the domestic help. Placed in an area that is away from main family spaces while still accessible.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: This room houses the laundry and storage. Ensures efficient workflow for servants and is placed near the servant's quarters.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A colonial-style main entrance with a vestibule. Ensures privacy and adds to the aesthetic value.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large colonial windows for natural light in the living room and bedrooms, adhering to Vastu by ensuring proper light distribution.

openings.name: Emergency Exit
openings.description: A secondary exit for safety. Designed to be discreet and functional.
